extendedInfo.description: If you are Blood On The Dance Floor's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Blood On The Dance Floor's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Blood On The Dance Floor's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Blood On The Dance Floor's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Let's Start A Riot- It's Hard To Be A Diamond In A Rhine Stone World- Epic- All The Rage- Evolution- Bad Blood************************List of lyrics ************************- All The Rage!- An Epic Of Epicness- Beautiful Surgery- Believe- Bewitched- Bitches Get Stitches- Blood On The Dance Floor- Blood On The Dance Floor (DJ Pickee Remix)- Candyland- Crucified By Your Lies- Dark Dreams- Death To Your Heart!- Deja Vu- Do You Want To Be A Superstar?- Fallen Star- Fantasyland- Find Your Way- Frankenstein + The Bride- Fuck The Rest, We The Best- G.F.A.- Happy Violentine's Day- Hollywood Tragedy- Horrifically Delicious- I â¥ Hello Kitty- I Can't Get Enuff- I Hope You Choke- I Refuse To Sink (Fuck The Fame)- I.D.G.A.F.- I'm What Dreams Are Made Of- Ima Monster (Heart On My Sleeve)- Incomplete & All Alone- Inject Me Sweetly- Innocent High- It's Hard To Be A Diamond In A Rhine Stone World- It's On Like Donkey Kong- Keys To The Bakery- Libertine- Lookin' Hot Dangerous!- Lose Control- Love Conquers All- Love Is The Message- Love Sucks (My X Is A Vampire)- Loveotomy- Lovestruck- Mad Rad Hair- Mercy- Modern World Christ- Money And Hoes- Mosh And Roll !- Mother Earth- My Gift & My Curse (James Egbert Remix)- Nirvana- P.L.U.R.- Party On- Rampage Of Love- Revenge Porn- Rise & Shine!- S My D- Save The Rave- Scream For My Ice Cream- Sex And Violence- Sexting- Slash Gash Terror Crew Anthem!- Sluts Get Guts- Star Power!- Success Is The Best Revenge- Sugar Rush- The Last Dance- The Law Of Love- The Loving Dead- The Right To Love- The Untouchables- Till Death Do We Party- Unforgiven- Unforgiven (Acoustic Version)- Wet Dream War Machine- X X 3- Yo Ho! (A Pirate's Life For Me)- You Are The Heart- You Done Goofed- You're A Dancer, You're Not A Lover

reviews.title: Really Good
reviews.comment: I love BOTDF and this app but only one album is missing which is \"The Anthem of The Outcast\"...can you please add it ...but this app is the best! I\'ve been waiting for a app like this! Really Great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: forgot some albums have we?
reviews.comment: Where is the album Clubbed to death

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The ads r annoying, but i can deal with em. Otherwise this app is awesome!  Also can ya make one for Falling In Reverse?

reviews.title: Okay

reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.title: Adware
reviews.comment: My Galaxy S4 said it was adware and should be removed. I don\'t want an app and have to be constantly reminded its bad for my phone. :/ Sorry but remove whatever made it say that and I\'m good.
reviews.author: Jasmine Diaz

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t have to handwrite my BOTDF lyrics because they are there.. This its a god-send c:

reviews.title: Awesome, but\342\200\246
reviews.comment: I love the appear, but a lot of albums and songs are missing, and some of the lyrics are wrong. Can you fix this? Oh, and also please add Bad Blood and the rest of that album\'s songs.
reviews.author: Olivia Gaines
